title.value: Identifies templates applicable to GMP documents.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution

template_query.value: cd_content_template(all) where a_status = 'Effective' and domain = 'Med Device' and (not any applicable_groups !=' ' or any applicable_groups in ('$value(primary_group)')) and ( not any applicable_subgroups != ' ' or any applicable_subgroups in ('$value(subgroup)')) and ( not any applicable_artifacts != ' ' or any applicable_artifacts in ('$value(artifact_name)')) and ( not any applicable_sites != ' ' or any applicable_sites in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)))
